short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Groups your tabs by domain automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome tab group feature is great for keeping track of your tabs, - but it can be quite laborious to create and update tab groups.

This extension takes the hassle out of the process - it'll automatically create tab groups for each site you visit. Very convenient if you ar into the habit of opening pages  in new tabs. You can also create your own custom rules for which sites should be assigned to what tab groups.
